title: HateXplain - Explainable Hate Speech Detection
description: Multi-task hate speech annotation with classification (hate/offensive/normal), target community identification, and rationale span highlighting. Based on the HateXplain benchmark (Mathew et al., AAAI 2021) - the first dataset covering classification, target identification, and rationale extraction.
